name: MIPL WC Checkout Fields
author: Mulika Team

sections.description:
Customize WooCommerce Checkout Fields, Create Group of custom fields for particular Products or Category and repeat with quantity,
Also update default checkout fields.

Features

  • Multiple Group of Checkout Custom Fields.
  • Apply to particular Products & Category.
  • Field Group Repeat By Product Quantity.
  • Display Checkout Fields on Order Edit page and all WC Email Template.
  • Multiple type input fields(Text, Select, Textarea, Radio, Checkbox, Email, Telephone, Time, Date, Color, Datetime).
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugins folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Create Checkout Fields Group and Create Required Fields as per the Product.
  4. Make Field Group Settings.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added Fields groups to single product page.
  • Fixed common fields of checkout page, which are not depend on products.
  • Fixed file fields & upload directory.
  • Small fixes.

1.0.9

  • Small fixes.

1.0.8

  • Compatible with WooCommerce 8.2 (High Performance Order Storage).
  • Solve issue of “Email Template” fields data.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4 Version.

1.0.7

  • Small fixes.
  • Layout changes.
  • WordPress 6.3.1 compatible.

1.0.6

  • Fixed file field size & upload in field groups.
  • Fixes of reCAPTCHA.
  • Fixes of select tag.
  • Fixes for WordPress 6.3 compatible.

1.0.5

  • Added reCAPTCHA.
  • Added Acceptance field.
  • Added File field
  • Added option to hide filed group heading.
  • Small fixes.

1.0.4

  • Added extra field group positions.
  • Added custom default fields groups.
  • Small fixes.

1.0.3

  • Added Active/Deactivate Option for Fields Groups.
  • Updated Datepicker for date & time field (added Flatpicker).
  • Updated Color Picker field.
  • Updated select field lib to Select2.
  • Solved some validation issue.

1.0.2

  • Small fixes.

1.0.1

  • Add Multiple Checkout Custom Fields Groups.
  • Apply to particular Products & Category.
  • Field Group Repeat By Product Quantity.
  • Display Checkout Fields on Order Edit page and all WC Email Template.
  • Multiple type input fields(Text, Select, Textarea, Radio, Checkbox, Email, Telephone, Time, Date, Color, Datetime).

1.0.0

  • Fields Group.
  • Multiple Input Types.
  • Fields validation.

sections.reviews:
Great Plugin

By Fulesh (fulesh.shete) on May 20, 2023

Very nice plugin, Easy to add the custom fields groups on WooCommerce checkout page, Even we can change the default checkout fields, Great Work!
